The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 January is 3,159,652 (5,613.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 18 January, there were 255,301 new confirmed cases (453.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 January, there were 317,734 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 20% (62,433 fewer cases).
